DOC.brief_summary: For correct presbyopia , study , investigator recruit subject age 45~65 year presbyopia ocular disease ( ex , ocular surface disease , corneal dystrophy , retinal disorder , etc. ) . All participant underwent ophthalmic examination include manifest refraction , uncorrected distance visual acuity ( UDVA ) , uncorrected near visual acuity ( UNVA ) , correct distance visual acuity ( CDVA ) , correct near visual acuity ( CNVA ) , Goldmann visual field test , depth focus Contrast sensitivity test , slit-lamp examination , topography scheimp flug device ( OCULUS pentacam ® ) OSDI ( ocular surface disease index ) Questionnaire visual function ocular symptom . Apply pinhole soft contact lens ( eyelike NoanPinhole ® , seoul , south Korea , Koryo Eyetech ) non-dominant eye participant and/or soft contact lens distance vision dominant eye participant . The investigator recommend use pinhole contact lens least 3 hour day 1 week . And , participant underwent ophthalmic examination 2 week first apply pinhole contact lens . The investigator compare ophthalmic parameter mention wear pinhole contact lens evaluate efficacy safety pinhole soft contact lens correct presbyopia .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Efficacy Pinhole Soft Contact Lenses Correcting Presbyopia
DOC.criteria: Age , 45~65 year presbyopia Patients anterior segment pathology , Patients previous intraocular corneal surgery , Patients severe cataract , Patients corneal abnormality ( include endothelial dystrophy , recurrent corneal erosion , etc . ) , Patients history chronic dry eye , macular degeneration , Patients retinal detachment , fundus pathology
